name: --intergalactic-bg-highlight-results
description: Use it for highlighting the search results in the list.

name: --intergalactic-text-link-invert
description: Use these styles on dark background.

name: --intergalactic-text-link-invert-hover
description: Use these styles on dark background.

name: --intergalactic-text-hint-invert
description: Use these styles on dark background.

name: --intergalactic-text-hint-invert-hover-active
description: Use these styles on dark background.

name: --intergalactic-border-primary
description: Use it for all neutral primary borders.

name: --intergalactic-border-secondary
description: Use it for subtle secondary borders like all Poppers have.

name: --intergalactic-border-info
description: Use it for borders in Notice and input fields.

name: --intergalactic-border-info-active
description: Use it for borders in focused input fileds.

name: --intergalactic-border-success
description: Use it for borders in Notice and input fields.

name: --intergalactic-border-success-active
description: Use it for borders in focused input fields.

name: --intergalactic-border-danger
description: Use it for borders in Notice and input fields.

name: --intergalactic-border-danger-active
description: Use it for borders in focused input fields.

name: --intergalactic-border-warning
description: Use it for borders in Notice.

name: --intergalactic-border-primary-invert
description: Use it for borders of controls on the dark or color background.

name: --intergalactic-border-secondary-invert
description: Use it as an invert borders on the dark or color background.

name: --intergalactic-border-tooltip-invert
description: Use only for the dark Tooltip.

name: --intergalactic-fs-50
description: Use only for text in Badge component.

name: --intergalactic-fs-100
description: Use with caution for text in additional messages. Always check its contrast and readability.

name: --intergalactic-fs-200
description: Use for text in regular messages.

name: --intergalactic-fs-300
description: Use for H6 with bold font-weight, and for text in regular messages.

name: --intergalactic-scale-indent
description: Base denominator of the design system.

name: --intergalactic-form-control-m
description: Use for default size of the controls.

name: --intergalactic-form-control-l
description: Use for large size of the controls.

name: --intergalactic-rounded-small
description: Use only for checkbox and placeholder addons.

name: --intergalactic-rounded-medium
description: Use for all inputs and controls, widgets.

name: --intergalactic-rounded-large
description: Use for all inputs and controls, widgets.

name: --intergalactic-disabled-opacity
description: Variable for disabled state. Use it for all controls to make them look disabled.

name: --intergalactic-overlay-primary
description: Use for cover the content under the modal dialogs.

name: --intergalactic-overlay-secondary
description: Use for the secondary modal dialogs that were opened upon the other modal dialogs.

name: --intergalactic-overlay-limitation-primary
description: Use as a primary cover of the content under the messages about limitations.

name: --intergalactic-overlay-limitation-secondary
description: Use as a secondary cover of the content under the messages about limitations.
